Package org.spongepowered.api.world.volume.biome

Interface BiomeVolume

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Volume
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArchetypeVolume, BiomeVolume.Immutable, BiomeVolume.Mutable<M>, BiomeVolume.Streamable<B>, BiomeVolume.Unmodifiable<U>, Chunk, ClientWorld, EnvironmentalVolume, GenerationRegion, PrimitiveChunk, ProtoChunk<P>, ProtoWorld<P>, Region<R>, Schematic, ServerWorld, World<W,​L>
    public interface BiomeVolume
extends Volume

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  BiomeVolume.Immutable  
      static interface  BiomeVolume.Mutable<M extends BiomeVolume.Mutable<M>>  
      static interface  BiomeVolume.Streamable<B extends BiomeVolume.Streamable<B>>  
      static interface  BiomeVolume.Unmodifiable<U extends BiomeVolume.Unmodifiable<U>>
      Like a BlockVolume except in the case that while the parent volume can potentially be a MutableVolume, this volume returned will not be.
